name: DuolDice
description:
Survive as two die rolls decide your only available actions!

You can only use the A and D keys, but what you can do with them will change regularly, and you have to dodge through enemies in this classic pixel platformer.

Controls:

A Key

D Key

That's it. These are the only two buttons you need.

Press Escape to Pause the game.

You can fall through the bottom side of the screen to drop from the top side, and similarly walk to and from the left and right sides of the screen.
